original_title: Vamos Tocar Todos Juntos Para Ouvirmos Melhor
overview: A fictional documentary about the acceptance and understanding of the artistic deconstruction of ideas and themes that are rooted in a certain collective imagination of our society.

production_companies.name: A Música Portuguesa A Gostar Dela Própria

title: Vamos Tocar Todos Juntos Para Ouvirmos Melhor
